duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform radiographic and fluoroscopic procedures under general supervision.
Assist the radiologist during procedures and ensure proper darkroom techniques and radiation safety guidelines.
Operate imaging and fluoroscopic equipment, and utilize proper body mechanics for patient safety.
Prepare patients for exams, troubleshoot equipment failures, and process imaging data.
Produce quality images following established departmental and QA protocols.
Prepare contrast media under the direction of a radiologist and recognize/respond to allergic reactions.
